definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
partition/to stand between/wall or fence serving as partition
to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)

sentences.english: If I attack you like this, how would you defend me?
sentences.chinese: 如果我咁樣攻擊你，你會點樣擋隔？

sentences.english: ''O.K., O.K., I'll get back your cellphone, '' I told her through the door.
sentences.chinese: “好，好，我會把你的手機拿來，”我隔着門跟她說。

sentences.english: The surface of the sea seems to be an invisible membrane between the water and the air.
sentences.chinese: 海的表面似乎是隔在水與空氣間的一層看不見的薄膜。

sentences.english: How can the earth pull on something from a distance, that it’s not even attached to?
sentences.chinese: 地球是怎樣隔着這麼遠“拉”動物體的呢？

sentences.english: His mother used cardboard to section off a small pantry.
sentences.chinese: 他母親用硬紙板隔了一小間食品室。

sentences.english: The house was divided into flats.
sentences.chinese: 那所房子被隔成數套房間。

sentences.english: Whirl it and divide to north and to south.
sentences.chinese: 疾速旋轉並劃分隔爲到北和到南。

sentences.english: "Who is it?" asks one of the nuns through the door.
sentences.chinese: “誰呀？”其中一個修女隔着門問。

sentences.english: Measurement showed the septum pellucid deviated from falx cerebrum and midline.
sentences.chinese: 透明隔移位的測量提示透明隔偏離大腦鐮及中線。

sentences.english: Measurement showed the septum pellucid deviated from falx cerebrum and midline.
sentences.chinese: 透明隔移位的測量提示透明隔偏離大腦鐮及中線。

sentences.english: No, just a few blocks, past the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 不會，只隔幾條街，走過公車站就到了。

sentences.english: As Visser is about to emerge, she fires through the door, and Visser falls.
sentences.chinese: 當維瑟出現時，她隔着門開槍把維瑟打倒。

sentences.english: Leave for 1 hour before pressing the button to re-activater the unit.
sentences.chinese: 自動關閉後，建議隔一個小時後再重新按下啓動按鈕。

sentences.english: A screen separated her bed from the rest of her one-room apartment.
sentences.chinese: 屏風把她的牀與單間公寓的其他部位隔開來。

sentences.english: The imperial tombs lie opposite the palaces across Henghe River.
sentences.chinese: 王室墓羣隔洹河與皇宮相望。

sentences.english: This paper has tried to combined the disjoining of complex sand-body with the interlayers.
sentences.chinese: 本文將複合砂體劈分與隔夾層結合研究。

definition: gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
distance apart/separated by a given distance
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
